* Details
Converts an entire Powershell script into a single line that you can copy and paste.
It base64 encodes the script and then uses Powershell to execute the encrypted string.

* Usage
It'll send the copy-pasteable line to stdout, as well as copy it to your clipboard.
The powershell command can be pasted thereonward.

#+begin_src shell
Import-Module -Name ".\truncate-powershell.ps1"
Truncate-Powershell .\my-custom-script.ps1

C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe -EncodedCommand ""

Command copied to clipboard
#+end_src shell
